title: Simple Vec3 control
Object to Vec3
source:
const control = new Vec3Control({
    device: null,
    name: 'sensor'
})

control.setValue({x: 10, y: 20, z: 30})

logger.log(control.value instanceof Vec3)  // true
logger.log(control.value.x, control.value.y, control.value.z)
